quizzes.question: What was the initial focus of the course on AI and urban mobility?
options: The ethical issues related to AI
Real life examples from the EU
quizzes.explanation: The course began with an overview of current urban mobility trends and how transport systems are evolving.

quizzes.question: Which aspect of AI in mobility was discussed in the final part of the course?
quizzes.explanation: The final part of the course explored the challenges and ethical issues related to the use of AI in mobility.

quizzes.question: How can learners deepen their knowledge on AI and urban mobility after the course?
options: By exploring references and complementary materials
By developing their own AI applications
quizzes.explanation: Learners are encouraged to explore the sources listed in the references and complementary materials to deepen their knowledge.
